attributes.additional_details: it would decrease the homelessness, give more employment opportunities.It also would also give the low income families the chance to go to uni and get qualifications so they are able to get jobs to support there families.it gives everyone the opportunity to fulfill their dreams.
attributes.background: The UK is one of the most expensive countries to study at university, fees are expensive and students are left riddled with debt.This is a petition to see if we can abolish university fees,to give more people the opportunity to learn at a higher level and qualifications to get jobs.
